Victor Castro is a Principal Data Scientist at <a href="https://massgeneralbrigham.org">Mass General Brigham</a> and a Ph.D. student in <a href="https://bouve.northeastern.edu/">Population Health at Northeastern University</a>. His current research interests include Long COVID phenotyping, developing methods for characterizing neuropsychiatric symptoms in large real-world datasets and understanding the impact of health disparities on population health research.
